ygData.subject: RE: Pixie Strike in PvP
ygData.msgSnippet: i don t remember a patch since i fought that level 50 cleric in a duel, and it worked wonders, interrupting him every time.  that was approximately 1 week ago.
ygData.messageBody:
i don't remember a patch since i fought that level 50 cleric in a duel, and
it worked wonders, interrupting him every time. that was approximately 1
week ago. guess i have to try it again. this will KILL my duel strategy =)

Shada D'ukal, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
Erisi Dlarit, Level 24 High Elf Paladin
Tyria Sarkin, Level 22 High Elf Wizard
Manda, Level 11 Wood Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server

> From: <kim@...>
>
> Pixie Strike is indeed broken in PvP play. Most of the time
> when the target does not resist, you get the "glaze" message
> but it does not affect him in the least. You can see the same
> thing using Pixie Strike on yourself.
>
> --
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
